CustomField.description: this fieldis created for coding purpose. It stores the record type name of the record. It will be present in the page layout as the type field
CustomField.formula: CASE($RecordType.Name, "D&S PrePriced","D&S PrePriced", "D&S PrePriced Restricted","D&S PrePriced", "D&S PrePriced FollowOn","D&S PrePriced", "D&S PrePriced Restricted FollowOn","D&S PrePriced", "D&S Complex","D&S Complex", "D&S Complex Restricted","D&S Complex", "D&S Complex FollowOn","D&S Complex", "D&S Complex Restricted FollowOn","D&S Complex", "D&S Standard","D&S Standard", "D&S Standard Restricted","D&S Standard", "D&S Standard FollowOn","D&S Standard", "D&S Standard Restricted FollowOn","D&S Standard", $RecordType.Name)
CustomField.label: Opportunity Type
